flawed_nl_solution:
Each episode is 20 minutes long, and there are 90 episodes, so the series takes 20 minutes per episode * 90 episodes = <<20*90=18000>>18000 minutes to watch.
18000 minutes / 60 minutes per hour = <<18000/60=300>>300 hours to watch the series.
Tom can watch 2 hours of TV a day, so it will take him 300 hours / 2 hours per day = <<300/2=150>>150 days to watch the entire series.
#### 150

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 18000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
